actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 and the Trans-Alaska Pipeline Authorization Act to require the development of a plan to assure the equitable allocation of available crude oil and petroleum products.
short_title: Alaskan Oil Distribution, Transportation, and Export Plan Amendments

summary.text: Alaskan Oil Distribution, Transportation, and Export Plan Amendments - Amends the Trans-Alaska Pipeline Authorization Act and the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 to direct the President to develop a plan for an equitable system of transportation, allocation, and distribution of Alaskan petroleum resources to all areas of the United States.

titles.title: Alaskan Oil Distribution, Transportation, and Export Plan Amendments

A bill to amend the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 and the Trans-Alaska Pipeline Authorization Act to require the development of a plan to assure the equitable allocation of available crude oil and petroleum products.
